PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ActionRequest
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: An action request is a request for an action to fulfill a need.

PropertyDef.Name: RequestSourceType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of sources through which a request can be made.

PropertyDef.Name: RequestSourceLabel
PropertyDef.Definition: A specific name or label that further qualifies the identity of a request source. In the event of an email, this may be the email address.

PropertyDef.Name: RequestSourceName
PropertyDef.Definition: The person making the request, where known.

PropertyDef.Name: RequestComments
PropertyDef.Definition: Comments that may be made on the request.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: The status currently assigned to the request where: Hold = wait to see if further requests are received before deciding on action, NoAction = no action is required on this request, Schedule = plan action to take place as part of maintenance or other task planning/scheduling, Urgent = take action immediately.
